reviewText: Excellent teaching! Every church should consider going through this.
Mandatory reading for anyone who sincerely wants to lift people up to higher level, while affirming their dignity and capacity for self/God reliance.
Essential training for anyone who works in Church Benevolence

Great way to apply the book into a seminar series. Showed the DVD at our church's mission conference several weeks ago. Comes with discussion questions that can be downloaded from the Chalmers website. Highly enjoyed going through this with my church family.
